%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW staff_cost

     AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    h.EmployeeID                                                AS EmployeeID,
    p.PSGroupCode                                               AS Grade, 
    h.AnnualSalary                                              AS Salary, 
    cast(cast(h.AnnualSalary as float)/(365.0*7.4) as float)    AS HourlyRate,
    cast(le.ExpectedFrom as date)                               AS ReportMonthEndDate,
    le.LeaveDaysPerYear                                         AS LeaveAllowance,
    cast(case sign(datediff(day, cast(le.LeaveYearStart as date), le.expectedfrom))
                when 1 then le.LeaveYearStart
                when 0 then le.LeaveYearStart
                else dateadd(year, -1, le.LeaveYearStart)
            end as date) as LeaveStartDate,
    le.leavedaysperyear*(1 - abs((((datediff(day, cast(
            CASE sign(datediff(day, cast(le.leaveyearstart AS date), le.expectedfrom))
                WHEN 1 
                THEN le.leaveyearstart
            ELSE dateadd(year, -1, le.leaveyearstart)
            END AS date), le.expectedfrom))/364.25)%1)))        AS ExpectedLeaveHoursRemaining
    
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_dim h
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_leave_entitlement_dim le on h.EmployeeID = le.EmployeeID
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact r ON h.EmployeeID = r.EmployeeID AND r.IsActive = 'Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_payband_dim p ON r.PayBandID = r.PayBandID
WHERE
    h.IsActive = 'Y' AND
    le.AbsenceQuotaType = 'Annual Leave / P&P';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW carried_over
    
    AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    h.EmployeeID as EmployeeID,
    case sign(le.LeaveDaysPerYear - 148)
        when 1 then 148
        when 0 then 148
        else le.LeaveDaysPerYear
    end as CarriedOverHours

FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_dim h
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_leave_entitlement_dim le on h.EmployeeID = le.EmployeeID
WHERE
    le.AbsenceQuotaType = 'Brought Forward';

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW leave_taken

     AS

SELECT DISTINCT
    a.AbsenceID,
    a.EmployeeID,
    CASE
        WHEN sc.ReportMonthEndDate >= a.AbsenceEndDate
        THEN a.Hours
        ELSE a.Hours - (w.WorkDayHours * datediff(a.AbsenceEndDate, sc.ReportMonthEndDate))
    END AS LeaveHours,
    a.Days, 
    a.Hours,
    a.CalendarDays,
    a.AbsenceStartDate,
    a.AbsenceEndDate,
    sc.LeaveStartDate

FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_absence_dim a
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_work_schedule_dim w on a.WorkScheduleID = w.WorkScheduleID
LEFT JOIN staff_cost sc ON a.EmployeeID = sc.EmployeeID
WHERE
    a.AbsenceType IN ('PT Annual / P&P Leave', 'FT Annual / Priv Leave')
    AND 
    a.AbsenceStartDate  BETWEEN sc.LeaveStartDate AND sc.ReportMonthEndDate
GROUP BY 
    a.EmployeeID,a.AbsenceID,a.Days,a.Hours,a.CalendarDays,a.AbsenceStartDate,a.AbsenceEndDate,sc.LeaveStartDate,w.WorkDayHours,sc.ReportMonthEndDate
Order by AbsenceStartDate

%%sql
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW leave_taken_fixed

    AS

SELECT
EmployeeID,
SUM(LeaveHours) AS LeaveHoursTaken

FROM leave_taken
Where EmployeeID is not null and LeaveStartDate <= AbsenceStartDate
GROUP BY EmployeeID;

%%sql

-- CREATE OR REPLACE TEMPORARY VIEW odw_curated_db.mipins_hr_measures_NEW

--      AS
	 
SELECT DISTINCT
	ed.EmployeeID												    AS EmployeeID,					--h.pers_no
	ed.FirstName												    AS FirstName, 					--h.first_name, 
	ed.LastName													    AS LastName, 					--h.last_name, 
	ef.LegacyEmployeeNumber 									    AS EmployeeNo, 					--h.employee_no, 
	rf.CoCd 														AS CoCd,						--h.cocd,
	rf.CompanyCode													AS CompanyCode, 				--h.company_code,
    pad.PersonnelAreaCode										    AS PA, 							--h.pa
    pad.Description		            							    AS PersonnelArea,  				--h.personnel_area
    psad.PersonnelSubAreaCode          							    AS PSubArea,  					--h.psubarea
    psad.Description	            							    AS PersonnelSubArea,  			--h.personnel_subarea
    oud.OrganisationUnit										    AS OrgUnit, 					--h.org_unit
    oud.Description			        							    AS OrganizationalUnit, 			--h.organizational_unit
    concat(oud.OrganisationUnit,'00000',ccd.CostCenterCode) 	    AS OrganizationalKey1, 			--h.organizational_key1
    'No Info' 													    AS OrganizationalKey2, 			--h.organizational_key2
    cd.ContractCode 											    AS WorkC, 						--h.workc
    cd.Description 												    AS WorkContract, 				--h.work_contract
    cd.ContractTypeCode 										    AS CT, 							--h.ct
    cd.ContractType 											    AS ContractType, 				--h.contract_type
    pbd.PSGroupCode 											    AS PSGroup, 					--h.ps_group
    pbd.Description 											    AS PayBandDescription, 			--h.pay_band_description
    ed.FTE 														    AS FTE, 						--h.fte
    ed.WorkHours 												    AS WeekHours, 					--h.wk_hrs
    ed.PartTimeEmployee								                AS IndicatorPartTimeEmployee, 	--h.indicator_part_time_employee
    '3' 														    AS S, 							--h.s
    ed.EmploymentStatus 										    AS EmploymentStatus, 			--h.employment_status
    ed.Gender 													    AS GenderKey, 					--h.gender_key
    'No Info' 													    AS TRAStartDate, 				--h.tra_start_date
    'No Info' 													    AS TRAEndDate, 					--h.tra_end_date
    'No Info' 													    AS TRAStatus, 					--h.tra_status
    'No Info' 													    AS TRAGrade, 					--h.tra_grade
    ef.LegacyEmployeeNumber	                                        AS PrevPersNo,                  --h.prev_persno
    ed.Actr                                                         AS Actr,                        --h.actr
    ed.ReasonForAction                                              AS ReasonForAction,             --h.reason_for_action
    psd.PositionCode	                                            AS Position,                    --h.position
    psd.Description	                                                AS Position1,                   --h.position_1
    ccd.CostCenterCode 												AS CostCtr, 					--h.cost_ctr
    ccd.Description												    AS CostCentre, 					--h.cost_centre
    ed.CivilServiceStart										    AS CivilServiceStart, 			--h.civil_service_start
    ed.DateToCurrentJob	        								    AS DateToCurrentJob, 			--h.date_to_current_job
    ed.SeniorityDate	            							    AS SeniorityDate, 				--h.seniority_date
    ed.DateToSubstantiveGrade									    AS DateToSubstGrade, 			--h.date_to_subst_grade
    rf.ManagerEmployeeID	                                        AS PersNo1,                     --h.pers_no_1
    concat(med.FirstName,' ',med.LastName)		                    AS NameOfManagerOm,             --h.name_of_manager_om
    mpsd.PositionCode	                                            AS ManagerPosition,             --h.manager_position
    mpsd.Description	                                            AS ManagerPositionText,         --h.manager_position_text
    'No Info'													    AS CounterSignManager,          --h.counter_sign_manager
    lcd.LocationCode	                                            AS Loc,                         --h.loc
    lcd.Description	                                                AS Location,                    --h.location
    ed.OrgStartDate	            								    AS OrgStartDate, 				--h.org_start_date
    ed.FixTermEndDate	            							    AS FixTermEndDate, 				--h.fix_term_end_date
    ed.LoanStartDate	            							    AS LoanStartDate, 				--h.loan_start_date
    ed.LoanEndDate	                							    AS LoanEndDate, 				--h.loan_end_date
    egp.EEGrp	                        						    AS EEGrp, 						--h.eegrp
    egp.EmployeeGroup                                               AS EmployeeGroup, 				--h.employee_group
    ed.AnnualSalary											        AS AnnualSalary, 				--h.annual_salary
    ed.Currency														AS Curr,						--h.curr
    ef.NINumber													    AS NINumber,					--h.ni_number
    ef.DOB 												            AS BirthDate, 					--h.birth_date
    'No Info'													    AS AgeOfEmployee, 				--h.age_of_employee
    'No Info'													    AS EO, 							--h.eo
    'No Info'													    AS EthnicOrigin, 				--h.ethnic_origin
    'No Info'													    AS NID, 						--h.nid
    'No Info'													    AS Rel, 						--h.rel
    'No Info'													    AS ReligiousDenominationKey, 	--h.religious_denomination_key
    'No Info'													    AS Sxo, 						--h.sxo
    'No Info'													    AS WageType, 					--h.wage_type	
    'No Info'													    AS EmployeeSubgroup, 			--h.employee_subgroup
    'No Info'													    AS LoaAbsType, 					--h.loa_abs_type
    'No Info'													    AS LoaAbsenceTypeText, 			--h.loa_absence_type_text
    'No Info'													    AS SchemeReference, 			--h.scheme_reference
    'No Info'													    AS PensionSchemeName, 			--h.pension_scheme_name
    'No Info'													    AS DisabilityCode, 				--h.disability_code
    'No Info'													    AS DisabilityText, 				--h.disability_text
    'No Info'													    AS DisabilityCodeDescription, 	--h.disability_code_description
    prad.PayrollAreaCode                                            AS PArea,                       --h.parea 
    prad.Description                                                AS PayrollArea,                 --h.payroll_area
    ed.AssignmentNumber 										    AS AssignmentNumber, 			--h.assignment_number 
    ed.FTE2                                                         AS FTE2,                        --h.fte_2 
	sc.ReportMonthEndDate											AS Report_MonthEnd_Date,
	coalesce(sc.LeaveAllowance,0)+coalesce(co.CarriedOverHours,0)	AS leave_entitlement_hrs,
	coalesce(lt.LeaveHoursTaken,0) 									AS leave_taken_hrs,
	round((coalesce(sc.LeaveAllowance,0)+ 
		coalesce(co.CarriedOverHours,0) - 
		coalesce(sc.ExpectedLeaveHoursRemaining, 0)  - 
		coalesce(lt.LeaveHoursTaken, 0)), 2) 						AS leave_remaining_hours,
	coalesce(round(sc.ExpectedLeaveHoursRemaining, 2), 0) 			AS leave_remaining_prorata_hours,
	rf.IngestionDate 												AS IngestionDate,
    IFNULL(rf.ValidTo, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP) 							AS ValidTo
	--,coalesce(round((coalesce(sc.LeaveAllowance, 0) + coalesce(co.CarriedOverHours, 0) - coalesce(sc.ExpectedLeaveHoursRemaining, 0)  - coalesce(lt.LeaveHoursTaken, 0)) * (sc.hourly_rate) * (1 + p.Total), 2),0.0) as cost_untaken_al
-- from odw_standardised_db.vw_saphr h
FROM odw_harmonised_db.hr_record_fact rf
	LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_dim ed 					ON rf.EmployeeID = ed.EmployeeID
	LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_fact ef 				ON rf.EmployeeID = ef.EmployeeID
	LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_personnel_area_dim pad 			ON rf.PersonnelAreaID = pad.PersonnelAreaID
	LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_personnel_sub_area_dim psad 		ON rf.PersonnelSubAreaID = psad.PersonnelSubAreaID
	LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_organisation_unit_dim oud 		ON rf.OrganisationalUnitID = oud.OrganisationUnitID
	LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_costcenter_dim ccd 				ON rf.CostCenterID = ccd.CostCenterID
	LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_contract_dim cd 					ON rf.ContractID = cd.ContractID
	LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_payband_dim pbd 					ON rf.PayBandID = pbd.PayBandID
    LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_hr_hierarchy_dim ehd    ON rf.EmployeeID = ehd.EmployeeID
    LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_position_dim psd 				ON rf.PositionID = psd.PositionID
    LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employeegroup_dim egp 			ON rf.EmployeeGroupID = egp.EmployeeGroupID
    LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_pins_location_dim lcd 	        ON rf.LocationID = lcd.LocationID
    LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_payroll_area_dim prad 	        ON rf.PayrollAreaID = prad.PayrollAreaID

    LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_employee_dim med 				ON rf.ManagerEmployeeID = ed.EmployeeID
    LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.hr_position_dim mpsd 				ON rf.ManagerPositionID = psd.PositionID



	left join staff_cost sc on cast(rf.EmployeeID as int) = cast(sc.EmployeeID as int)
	left join carried_over co on cast(sc.EmployeeID as int) = cast(co.EmployeeID as int)
	left join leave_taken_fixed lt on cast(sc.EmployeeID as int) = cast(lt.EmployeeID as int)
	left join odw_standardised_db.bis_pension_ernic_rates p on sc.Grade = p.Grade

WHERE 
	right(cast(cast(sc.ReportMonthEndDate as date) as varchar(10)),5) in ('01-31','02-28','02-29','03-31','04-30','05-31','06-30','07-31','08-31','09-30','10-31','11-30','12-31')
